titleStmt.title: The apparition, or the genius of Ireland complaining of her present misery and imploring speedy relief from England : dedicated to Duke Schomberg / written by Edm. Arwaker.
titleStmt.author: Arwaker, Edmund, d. 1730.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley, and are to be sold by R. Baldwin,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
